camel.sink.path.baseUrl.name: camel.sink.path.baseUrl
camel.sink.path.baseUrl.description: Base URL of the repository to which the request is made through the OAI-PMH protocol

camel.sink.endpoint.from.name: camel.sink.endpoint.from
camel.sink.endpoint.from.description: Specifies a lower bound for datestamp-based selective harvesting. UTC DateTime value

camel.sink.endpoint.identifier.name: camel.sink.endpoint.identifier
camel.sink.endpoint.identifier.description: Identifier of the requested resources. Applicable only with certain verbs

camel.sink.endpoint.metadataPrefix.name: camel.sink.endpoint.metadataPrefix
camel.sink.endpoint.metadataPrefix.description: Specifies the metadataPrefix of the format that should be included in the metadata part of the returned records.

camel.sink.endpoint.set.name: camel.sink.endpoint.set
camel.sink.endpoint.set.description: Specifies membership as a criteria for set-based selective harvesting

camel.sink.endpoint.until.name: camel.sink.endpoint.until
camel.sink.endpoint.until.description: Specifies an upper bound for datestamp-based selective harvesting. UTC DateTime value.

camel.sink.endpoint.verb.name: camel.sink.endpoint.verb
camel.sink.endpoint.verb.description: Request name supported by OAI-PMh protocol

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.onlyFirst.name: camel.sink.endpoint.onlyFirst
camel.sink.endpoint.onlyFirst.description: Returns the response of a single request. Otherwise it will make requests until there is no more data to return.

camel.sink.endpoint.ssl.name: camel.sink.endpoint.ssl
camel.sink.endpoint.ssl.description: Causes the defined url to make an https request

camel.component.oaipmh.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.component.oaipmh.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.oaipmh.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.oaipmh.autowiredEnabled.name: camel.component.oaipmh.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.oaipmh.autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.
